text: Rosalía Castro de Murguía better known as Rosalía de Castro (24 February 1837 – 15 July 1885) was a Galician writer and poet. A native of Santiago de Compostela in the Galicia region of northwest Spain, she wrote in both Galician and Castilian. == Works == ===In Galician=== ;Poetry * Cantares gallegos (1863) * Follas novas (1880) ;Prose * Contos da miña terra I (1864) ===In Spanish=== ;Poetry * La Flor (1857) (the Flower) * A mi madre (1863) (to my mother) * En las orillas del Sar (1884) ;Prose * La hija del mar (1859) (the daughter of the sea) * Flavio (1861) * El cadiceño (1863) * Ruinas (1866) * Las literatas (1866) * El caballero de las botas azules (1867) * El primer loco (1881) * El domingo de Ramos (1881) * Padrón y las inundaciones (1881) Category:Spanish writers Category:Spanish poets Category:Galician people Category:1837 births Category:1885 deaths Category:People from Santiago de Compostela
title: Rosalía de Castro
